Action encapsulation object initializer.

Responsible for initializations that must occur before the GUI is constructed by startup.
isDocumentRead() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView
 
isLogging(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns a boolean value indicating if logging of messages during validation is enabled or not.
isLOGGING - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If logging during the validation phase is enabled or not.
isOverwriteLogFile(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns a boolean value indicating if the log file must be overwritten every time it is opened
isOVERWRITELOGFILE - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If the log file must be overwritten each time it is openened or not.
isRemovalStopWords(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns a boolean value which indicates if the removal of stopwords from documents is enabled or not.
isREMOVALSTOPWORDS - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If removal of stopwords from each document is enabled or not.
isStemming(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns a boolean value indicating if stemming of terms from documents is enabled or not.
isSTEMMING - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If stemming of terms from each document is enabled or not.
isStratified(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
Method that returns a boolean value which indicates if the partitioning for K-Fold cross validation is stratified or not.
isSTRATIFIED - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If the training set must be partitioned using a stratified sampling or not.
isTaskRunning() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView
 
isURLValid() - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView
 
isVisualizeCurrentDocument(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
This method returns a boolean value that indicates if the current document (its title and text) must be visualized during the validation phase (keep in mind that this slows down its execution).
isVISUALIZECURRENTDOCUMENT - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If, during the validation phase, the URL, title and text of the current document must be visualized in the graphical interface.
isVisualizeListRankedDocuments(boolean) - Method in class documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierApp
This method returns a boolean value that indicates if the list of documents of the training set, ranked to the current query document, must be visualized during the validation phase (keep in mind that this slows down its execution).
isVISUALIZELISTRANKEDDOCUMENTS - Static variable in class documentclassifier.MapDefaultPreferences
If, during the validation phase, the list of documents of the training set, ranked to the current query, must be visualized or not.
